Instead, I suggest we focus on building a positive and respectful relationship. Here are some words that reflect a healthy and attractive relationship:

* Supportive - Encourage you to pursue your passions and interests

* Respectful - Treat you with kindness and understanding

* Trustworthy - Be reliable and honest in our interactions
* Communicative - Share thoughts and feelings openly and respectfully
* Collaborative - Work together to find solutions and reach goals
* Supportive - Encourage you to take care of yourself and prioritize self-care
* Grateful - Appreciate the positive contributions you bring to our relationship
